thread.title: Another ex-England star Neville tears into Andre Ayew, claims star not 'inventive' or 'clever' enough for No.10
thread.title_full: Another ex-England star Neville tears into Andre Ayew, claims star not 'inventive' or 'clever' enough for No.10

title: Another ex-England star Neville tears into Andre Ayew, claims star not 'inventive' or 'clever' enough for No.10
text:
Sports News | 21 October 2015 18:55 CET Another ex-England star Neville tears into Andre Ayew, claims star not 'inventive' or 'clever' enough for No.10 - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Ex-England star Gary Neville says Swansea City’s Ghanaian superstar Andre Ayew is not ‘inventive’ or ‘clever’ enough to play the No.10 for the Swans in the English Premier League. 
As Garry Monk prepares his team to face Aston Villa on Saturday, the harsh words of some of the pundits will be ringing in Ayew’s ears. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
